<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mantle of the Grogrisant](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1476)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 35

**Price** 22,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This long, golden cloak is among the royal regalia of the emperors of Taldor. It was fashioned from the pelt of [Grogrisant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1727) itself, after being slain by Taldaris, and Grogrisant's mane was fashioned into a thick fringe that runs all along the mantle's edges. The paws of the Grogrisant cross beneath the wearer's throat, giving you an imposing appearance. The _Mantle of the Grogrisant_ grants you [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) resistance 15 and physical resistance 5 (except bludgeoning).

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> envision, Interact ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You pull the hood of the mantle over your face, revealing the six eyes of Grogrisant. The mantle gives off a flash of blinding light in a 60-foot emanation. All enemies within this area must attempt a DC 38 Fortitude saving throw. On a failure, they're [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1 minute. On a critical failure, they're permanently blinded. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Mantle of the Grogrisant
